message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,350,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was hoping to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective and I'm keen on finding a solution that works for both of us. While $1,200,000 is a bit too low for me to accept, I'm willing to come down to $1,275,000. This reflects the true value of the product and the benefits it will bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $1,225,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
